recipesJson.name: Delicious Melons
recipesJson.author: falon1000
recipesJson.description:
TPA - Honeydew - Delicious honeydew
FA - Blenderize - Decent gum flavor, blends well with honeydew
FLV - Wild Melon - Backup for the honeydew
CAP Blue Raspberry Cotton Candy - Overall sweetness

reviews.text: Very light and refreshing recipe. Great authentic melon flavor with a nice rind note that keeps it real. I'll definitely be hanging onto this recipe to mix again in the future. Great job!
